person.persName: Peter Maddox Boaz (Calloway County, KY, tobacconist, farmer, and prov govt conv rep )

body.p: Calloway County, Kentucky, tobacconist and farmer. Virginia native. Married to Winifred M. Carter Boaz in 1850. Father of Edward Boaz, David R. Boaz, and Joseph Boaz. Married to Louise Ann Ryan Boaz in Calloway County on September 18, 1855. Father of Susan Boaz and Ex Boaz. Tobacconist in Calloway County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Calloway County in 1850. Farmer in Calloway County in 1860. Owned twelve enslaved persons in Calloway County in 1860. Member of the convention of the provisional government held at Russellville in November 1861.
